_From [OLEGtheK...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/106579007142717194127/) on December 01, 2011 21:39:37_

It seems if a creature with a +1/+1 counter (for example Joraga Warcaller) is put into a graveyard and then returned to battlefield (for example with Griomoire of the Dead 2nd ability) it will still have those counters on itself.
